metadata.dc:author: Jensen, C E
Torres, M D
Alvarez, A F
Garcia, J M
metadata.dc:description: The purpose of this article is to describe oral manifestations of AIDS, specially opportunistic infections, hairy leukoplakia and Kaposi's sarcoma. Fungal infections, viral infections, salivary glands disturbances and neoplasms are related. Treatment and epidemiology in Argentine are included.
metadata.dc:title: Enfermedades estomatológicas y síndrome de inmuno deficiencia adquirida.
[Mouth diseases and acquired immunodeficiency syndrome].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista del Ateneo Argentino de Odontologia : R.A.A.O
